channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Traffic; INC#0124; 02:20AM; Wb 10 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Khb9JL; Palms; Vehicle went over embankment and landed in encampment with a total of five patients. Three patients extricated from the vehicle and transported in *at least* serious condition. Two patients transported in fair condition. Ages/genders unknown. Any media questions are referred to CHP Log # 198 and LAPD Inc# 0336; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E226 E261 E292 E294 E43 E58 E61 E94 EM1 EM11 EM9 RA43 RA58 RA61 RA68 RA858 RA894 RA94 T26 T61 T92 T94; CH4; 12; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire - Assisting Agency; INC#1130; 03:24PM; 15320 N Sierra Hw x Golden State Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/43FliHa; Sylmar; #VictorIncident Approximately 5 acres of heavy brush burning in 10-15mph winds with no structures currently threatened. This incident is in LACoFD jurisdiction and LAFD will be an Assisting Agency. All further updates will come from LACoFD.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E275 E28 E290 E298 E75 E8 E91 E98 EM15 H1 H3 H7 HA1 HA3 HA7 RA90 T75 T90 T98; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0889; 01:32PM; 11400 Poema Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44ZRnKJ; outside city; This incident is determined to be 100% inside Los Angeles County Fire Department jurisdiction and they will assume Incident Command. Any additional updates will come from LACoFD. ; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; AO1 AO2 BC15 BC17 CW3A E103 E104 E106 E107 E287 E290 E296 E70 E8 E90 EM15 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 RA104 RA90 T87 T90 T96; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0706; 01:17PM; 570 N Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DumIJK; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: Over 70 firefighters achieved full knockdown in two hours and three minutes. This will remain an active incident for an extensive overhaul operations. Cause and $ loss TBD. There are no additional injuries beyond the two firefighters transported earlier due to heat related illness. No further details.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 CM52 E20 E205 E226 E229 E235 E261 E27 E29 E35 E5 E52 E6 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM14 EM5 HR3 RA29 RA35 RA52 RA6 RA806 RA82 RM3 RT59 T26 T29 T35 T5 T61 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0889; 12:59PM; 11400 Poema Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44ZRnKJ; outside city; 1/4 acre burning in heavy brush under mild wind conditions (previous burn area). There is one exposure -two story condominium. Firefighters are currently anchoring the fire with handlines to prevent any progression.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC15 BC17 CW3A E103 E104 E107 E287 E296 E70 E8 E90 EM15 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 RA90 T87 T96; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0706; 12:15PM; 570 N Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DumIJK; East Hollywood; Firefighters are making good progress with the bulk of the fire extinguished. However, firefighters continue to work to address stubborn pockets of fire which are difficult to access due to building construction and location of the fire. Two firefighters were transported for heat related conditions (no further details). Once knockdown is achieved, it will be an extended overhaul operation requiring rotating schedules due to the extreme heat. Drivers are advised to avoid the area through the afternoon. ; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 CM52 E20 E205 E226 E229 E235 E261 E27 E29 E35 E5 E52 E6 E9 EA1 EM1 EM14 EM5 HR3 RA29 RA35 RA52 RA6 RA806 RA82 T26 T29 T35 T5 T61 UR5 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0769; 12:05PM; 725 E 27th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Y983gv; Historic South-Central; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews contained the fire to one unit on the 2nd floor. No further details.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E209 E221 E233 EM9 RA17 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T10 T21 T33; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0769; 11:47AM; 725 E 27th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Y983gv; Historic South-Central; Two story (vacant) apartment building with smoke and fire showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and additional resources are responding.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E209 E221 E233 EM9 RA17 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T10 T21 T33; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0706; 11:55AM; 570 N Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DumIJK; East Hollywood; Building description updated to a three story (vacant) townhouse (two above ground and one subterranean level) has fire on 1st and 2nd floor and possibly into the attic. Additional task force enroute, raising this to a Greater Alarm status. ; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E20 E205 E226 E229 E235 E261 E27 E29 E35 E5 E52 E6 E9 EA1 EM1 EM5 HR3 RA29 RA52 RA6 RA806 T26 T29 T35 T5 T61 UR5 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0706; 11:14AM; 4474 W Clinton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43BeZEo; East Hollywood; Two story, fourplex with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode with preliminary reports of fire on the 1st floor, possibly extending into the 2nd floor. One additional task force requested.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 E229 E29 E6 RA52 T29; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
